thread.title: Mrs D Broadbent
thread.title_full: Castlegatelights reviewed by Mrs D Broadbent

author: Mrs D Broadbent
title: Mrs D Broadbent
text: We have used the website several times now when moving onto our present home 6 years ago and more recently to replace lights lost and/or damaged during the floods in December 2015. We love the new option to pay through Amazon and delivery notifications are accurate so you are not waiting round for a delivery that is late or worse does not turn up like some other companies. The lights are great looking we now have Castle gate fittings and lamps all over the house.
